name: As It Is (Demo)
description:
We are Egghouse, and we 're developing As It Is, a narrative adventure game about helping animals be themselves. With As It Is, you can play as:

  • A small hedgehog 

With these planned characters in the future:

  • A small bird

Help Hedgehog make friends! Toot your trumpet! Your world is limitless!

Disclaimer: world is not actually limitless.

❗❗ This game is in early development & may have missing features, bugs, etc. ❗❗

Controls

MOVEMENT: arrow keys 
INTERACT: z
